mapper.insert: insert into base_student (id, student_code, name, email, number, age, address, phone, password, img_file, status, state, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update base_student set student_code = #{studentCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_file = #{imgFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, student_code, name, email, number, age, address, phone, password, img_file, status, state, is_deleted, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from base_student where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
